item.title: PTRAPR
item.description: An R package to analyze Rice panicle architecture.

item.title: Postcards
item.description: During the year I turned some plot that I like into postcards. If you like them, feel free to print them and give them as a gift. The source code is here. Tartan AKA: R packages downloaded from CRAN. In green: And in red: Galaxy AKA: Gene Expression Correlation. In white: And in blue: Christmas Tree AKA: A rice panicle. In blue: And in red:
